title: Roasted Garlic, Red Pepper and Tomato Pasta Sauce
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '4 tablespoons water', '5 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '6 plum tomatoes', '450g (16 oz) roasted red peppers', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried crushed chillies', 'handful chopped fresh basil']
